title: Vaccination offers for students at Fulda University of Applied Sciences
description: Dear students, the university is planning the lecture period of the winter semester in attendance. In this context, we would like to draw your attention to "open offers" of the Vaccination Centre.
text:
Since Monday, 19 July 2021, initial vaccinations have been taking place daily (Monday to Sunday) from 9 a.m. to 6 p.m. without prior appointment.
"150 additional first vaccinations with an mRNA vaccine are available per day at the Fulda vaccination centre (access via the Ochsenwiese), which can be attended without prior appointment. You must bring your vaccination card and health insurance card (if available) as well as your identity card or an identification document."
